text: Hello everyone! I am a student in applied and computational mathematics. I am excited to join the community here and ready to learn more about Julia for solving differential equations. I hope and look forward to hearing many of your advices. Thank you!

<@U01TMASQBKP> Welcome.
Julia
 main differential equations group morphered into SciML Scientific
Machine Learning Software, but they still working hard on many ODEs and
PDEs. You should check they materials. <https://sciml.ai/>

text: They recente incitive is JuliaSymbolics, spin-off of some symbolic computations that they already have for different reasons. I only remamber that they package DifferentialEquations.jl computed symbolicaly Jacobian at intermitied step to speed up computation. <https://juliasymbolics.org/>
